body: I've got a spork server but it only has (Removed) maps. Can someone give me a tutorial on how to work it with avicus maps and ymls
body_tagged: I've got a spork server but it only has (Removed) maps. Can someone give me a tutorial on how to work it with avicus maps and ymls
title: avicus maps and SporkPGM

replies.body:
You aren't allowed to use/download Avicus maps without Map Dev or Admin permission.

EDIT: + you need the permission of the creator and all helpers!
replies.body_tagged:
You aren't allowed to use/download Avicus maps without Map Dev or Admin permission.

EDIT: + you need the permission of the creator and all helpers!

replies.body: I know but if I did how would I work them with sporkpgm
replies.body_tagged: I know but if I did how would I work them with sporkpgm

reply_to.body:
You aren't allowed to use/download Avicus maps without Map Dev or Admin permission.

replies.body: You'd need to write an XML for each map.
replies.body_tagged: You'd need to write an XML for each map.

replies.body: Downloading for private use such as scrims and strats is fine. Loading it on a public "server server" isn't allowed. OP, I'm willing to XML some avicus maps into OCN format if you'd like since I've done it before.
replies.body_tagged: Downloading for private use such as scrims and strats is fine. Loading it on a public "server server" isn't allowed. OP, I'm willing to XML some avicus maps into OCN format if you'd like since I've done it before.
